description: The Brazilian Joyweed is a stunning member of the Amaranth family, renowned for its purple and white striped foliage. Its alternate, ovate leaves (up to 8 cm in length) and dense purple-green hues make it a great pick for an outdoor garden. Its long-living blooms, however, are its most amazing aspect, providing a burst of color in myriads of deep purples, pinks, and whites. When planted in full sun, this perennial will thrive and multiply, making your garden a place of even more beauty and joy. With the added benefit of the plant being low-maintenance, Brazilian Joyweed is an amazing choice for any garden.
